Description of incident: Insurance Services Office, which provides information and analytics to the property and casualty insurance industry has notified customers of a data breach of policyholder information.The company has been working with the County Prosecutor's office and the National Insurance Crime Bureau investigating the breach. Authorities informed ISO that an unauthorized individual (s) viewed personal information of policyholders. The information included contact information, dates of birth, Social Security numbers, insurance policy numbers, and driver's license numbers.For those with questions, contact a representative at 1-800-888-4476 7:00 a.m to 9:00 p.m Eastern Time or email njsupport@iso.comMore Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-57032
